title: The Sophomore
description: Jackson Rivers.My not so secret crush.He’s popular. Gorgeous. Talented.Also my biggest weakness.I’ve stood by him for years. Been a friend every time he needed one, but he doesn’t see me. Not like I want him to.Move on, my friends said. Find someone new. Someone who sees your worth. Someone who gets you. I know they’re right. I’m only a friend to him. He’s never going to see me like I see him. So I take their advice, and try to move on.But Jackson is always right there. In my face. Running to my rescue. And when I meet someone else, Jackson isn’t having it. For some reason, he’s suddenly determined to stay in my life. Right by my side.Now he says he wants me, but does he want an actual relationship? Or is that he can’t stand the thought of losing me to another guy?It’s time to find out what Jackson truly wants...and I’m going to make him work for it.For me.
author: Monica  Murphy
